items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
items.title: testcontainers/testcontainers-node: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: sigil-serv is a lightweight TypeScript + Express.js server to handle SSL certificate verification via HTTP file-based validation. It serves .txt files from verificationFiles/ at the path /.well-known/pki-validation/<filename>.txt for domain control validation.
items.title: thevirinchi/sigil-serv: sigil-serv is a lightweight TypeScript + Express.js server to handle SSL certificate verification via HTTP file-based validation. It serves .txt files from verificationFiles/ at the path /.well-known/pki-validation/<filename>.txt for domain control validation.

items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: A lightweight tool that takes your LinkedIn profile link, resume link, or PDF file, and automatically generates a stylish README.md for your GitHub main profile. It includes your bio, key info, favorite quote, and a personalized theme ‚Äî all previewed live before saving!
items.title: ishikajais27/GitFolio: A lightweight tool that takes your LinkedIn profile link, resume link, or PDF file, and automatically generates a stylish README.md for your GitHub main profile. It includes your bio, key info, favorite quote, and a personalized theme ‚Äî all previewed live before saving!
